Package suggestions

Class SuggestionsDB

  • Object
    • SuggestionsDB
  • public class SuggestionsDB
extends Object
    A database that stores all the existing suggestions in the system.
    Since:
    2023-11-17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Soo Qi Yang, Teo Kai Xuan, Masagca Merwyn Louie Dumasis, Nguyen Phuong Linh, Tee Jeeng Yee

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static int suggestionIdCounter
      This stores the next ID to be assigned to the next suggestion.
      private ArrayList<Suggestion> suggestionsDB
      This is the SuggestionsDB's list of all suggestions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description

      Creates a new SuggestionsDB object to store suggestions.

    • Field Detail

      • suggestionsDB

        private ArrayList<Suggestion> suggestionsDB
        This is the SuggestionsDB's list of all suggestions.

      • suggestionIdCounter

        private static int suggestionIdCounter
        This stores the next ID to be assigned to the next suggestion.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SuggestionsDB

        public SuggestionsDB()
        Creates a new SuggestionsDB object to store suggestions. This should only be called once to create a single database. It then tries to find a storage txt file to scan and initialise itself with any Suggestion entries that might have been stored from previous runs.

    • Method Detail

      • writeToStorage

        public void writeToStorage()
                    throws IOException
        Writes this SuggestionsDB's array of Suggestion entries into a txt file. This should be called at the end of the application in order to save the database into a file.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws an exception if it is unable to find the file to read or write to.

      • readFromStorage

        public void readFromStorage()
                     throws IOException,
                            ClassNotFoundException
        Searches for the designated storage txt file to read in Suggestion data from previous app runs, and adds those Suggestion objects to this SuggestionsDB database. If there is no storage file, does not read in anything and no new Suggestion entries are added to this SuggestionsDB database.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if it is unable to find the file to read or write to.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown if unable to find class that we are trying to reference.

      • sendSuggestion

        public void sendSuggestion​(String camp,
                           String text,
                           String user)
        Sends a Suggestion to SuggestionsDB database. This should be used only for camp committee members to send suggestions about the camp he manages.

        Example: suggestionsDB.sendSuggestion(((CampCommittee)currentUser).getCampName(), suggestionText, currentUser.getName());

        Parameters:
        camp - The name of the camp that the camp committee member manages.
        text - The suggestion text about the camp.
        user - The name of the camp committee member that wishes to send a suggestion.

      • editSuggestion

        public void editSuggestion​(int suggestionNumber,
                           String newText,
                           String user)
        Edits a Suggestion in SuggestionsDB database. This should be used only for camp committee members to edit suggestions. Suggestions can only be edited by the camp committee member that sent it and before the suggestion is processed (approved or rejected).
        Parameters:
        suggestionNumber - ID of the suggestion to be edited.
        newText - The new text that the suggestion should be changed to.
        user - The name of the camp committee member that wishes to edit a suggestion.

      • deleteSuggestion

        public void deleteSuggestion​(int suggestionNumber,
                             String user)
        Deletes a Suggestion from SuggestionsDB database. This should be used only for camp committee members to delete suggestions. Suggestions can only be deleted by the camp committee member that sent it and before the suggestion is processed (approved or rejected).
        Parameters:
        suggestionNumber - ID of the suggestion to be deleted.
        user - The name of the camp committee member that wishes to delete a suggestion.

      • displaySuggestion

        private void displaySuggestion​(Suggestion s)
        Internal method to print the details of Suggestion.
        Parameters:
        s - Suggestion object details to be printed.

      • viewOwnSuggestion

        public void viewOwnSuggestion​(String user)
        Allows camp committee members to view their own Suggestions in SuggestionsDB database. This should be used only by camp committee members.
        Parameters:
        user - The name of camp committee member that wishes to view his Suggestions and their status.

      • viewByCamp

        public void viewByCamp​(List<String> campList)
        Allows staff to view Suggestions about camps managed by them. This should be used only by staff.

        Example: suggestionsDB.viewByCamp(staff1.getCampsCreated());

        Parameters:
        campList - The list of the names of camps that the staff manages.

      • approveSuggestion

        public String approveSuggestion​(int suggestionNumber,
                                List<String> campList)
        Approves a Suggestion in SuggestionsDB database. This should be used only by staff. Suggestions about a camp can only be approved by the staff that created the camp and before the suggestion is expired (before the date to be approved by).
        Parameters:
        suggestionNumber - ID of the suggestion to be approved.
        campList - The list of the names of camps that the staff manages.
        Returns:
        Name of camp committee member whose suggestion was successfully approved. Returns null if suggestion not successfully approved.
